item.title: [317/Delta] Caveing (Custom Skill)
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

[quote=“funnerscape, post:13, topic:355363”]Nice Tut I’m gonna use it…however…when i compile i get this error

.\client.java:24737: cannot find symbol
symbol : method GetCLCaveing(int)
location: class Wearing
int CLCaveing = server.Wearing.GetCLCaveing(wearID);
^
.\client.java:24826: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable playerCaveing
location: class client
sM(“You need to have a “+statName[playerCaveing]
+” level of “+CLCaveing+”.”);
^
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Help??!?!?!
:)[/quote]
Ya I got a pretty good idea why that’s happening.

In Player.java search for “public int playerRunecrafting = 20;” and under it add

	public int playerCaveing = 21;

Also in Wearing.java find “public int GetCLRunecrafting(int ItemID) {” and under it add

public int GetCLCaveing(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Caveing cape")) { return 99; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Caveing hood")) { return 99; } return 1; }

Read full topic

item.title: [317/Delta] Caveing (Custom Skill)
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

Difficulty - 1/10
Things you need to have in your source: Client.java, Npchandler.java, Autospawn.cfg, Player.java, Wearing.java

Simple Skill I made where you type the command to go there and you have to kill a certain amount of the first monster to move on to the next stage. There’s 4 stages, You can add more if you want.

[size=12pt]Step 1:[/size]
Client.java
Right under “public class client extends Player implements Runnable {” add…

public void caveing() { if(!isInCaveing1() && !isInCaveing2() && !isInCaveing3() && !isInCaveing4()) { caveingstage = 0; kills1 = 0; kills2 = 0; kills3 = 0; kills4 = 0; boss1 = 0; boss2 = 0; boss3 = 0; } else { if(caveingstage == 1 && kills1 == 10) { addSkillXP(75000, 21); sM("Congratz! You've Completed Stage 1!"); sM("You need to kill 5 black dragons to Continue!"); caveingstage = 2; kills1 = 0; toX = 2709; toY = 9485; heightLevel = 0; } if (caveingstage == 2 && kills2 == 5) { addSkillXP(150000, 21); sM("Congratz! You've Conpleted Stage 2!"); sM("You need to kill 2 KBD's to continue!"); caveingstage = 3; kills2 = 0; toX = 2705; toY = 9522; heightLevel = 0; } if (caveingstage == 3 && kills3 == 2) { addSkillXP(200000, 21); sM("Congratz! You've Conpleted Stage 3!"); sM("You need to kill all 3 Boss's to continue!"); sM("Each boss is located in a different tunnel!"); caveingstage = 4; kills3 = 0; toX = 2705; toY = 9522; heightLevel = 0; } if (caveingstage == 4 && kills4 == 3) { cwin += 1; addSkillXP(575000, 21); addItem(995, 250000000); sM("CONGRATULATIONS! You've Beaten Caveing "+ cwin +" times!"); sM("You've won 1,000,000 exp during all stages."); sM("For Completeing it all, You also win 250mil!"); toX = 3213; toY = 3424; heightLevel = 0; } } }

[size=12pt]b[/b][/size]
Simple but lets see what everything does…

if(!isInCaveing1() && !isInCaveing2() && !isInCaveing3() && !isInCaveing4()) { caveingstage = 0; kills1 = 0; kills2 = 0; kills3 = 0; kills4 = 0; boss1 = 0; boss2 = 0; boss3 = 0; }
////
This basically just tells the server that if the person leaves one of the stages his stage level is reset so that people can’t leave and come back to where they were.

if(caveingstage == 1 && kills1 == 10) { addSkillXP(75000, 21); sM("Congratz! You've Completed Stage 1!"); sM("You need to kill 5 black dragons to Continue!"); caveingstage = 2; kills1 = 0; toX = 2709; toY = 9485; heightLevel = 0; }
////
This just tells the server that once the person has the amount of kills needed to continue to change their stage to the next one and teleports them there also giveing them skill exp for completing it.

if (caveingstage == 4 && kills4 == 3) { cwin += 1; addSkillXP(575000, 21); addItem(995, 250000000); sM("CONGRATULATIONS! You've Beaten Caveing "+ cwin +" times!"); sM("You've won 1,000,000 exp during all stages."); sM("For Completeing it all, You also win 250mil!"); toX = 3213; toY = 3424; heightLevel = 0; }
////
This teleports the person to varrock and gives them exp and a reward once they have completed all 4 stages and adds one to the total amount of stages they’ve completed.

Step 1.2:
Find “public String statName[]” and add this into it

, "caveing"

Step 1.4:
Find “case 20:” and add this case under it

case 21: // '\025' getTotalLevel(); changeText126("Congratulations! You've just advanced a Caveing level!", 4268); changeText126((new StringBuilder()).append("You have now reached level ").append(getLevelForXP(playerXP[i])). append("!").toString(), 4269); sendFrame164(4267); if (playerLevel[21] == 99) { itemMessage("Congratulations, Caveing level is now 99!", "Speak to Bob at Home for a skill cape of achievement.", 2698, 250); }

Step 1.6:
Add this to your commands

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("cstart")) { toX = 2736; toY = 9417; sM("You're now in Caveing Stage 1!"); sM("Kill 10 Blue Dragons to move on to stage 2!"); caveingstage = 1; heightLevel = 0; }

Step 1.7:
Find “int CLRunecrafting” and add this under it

			int CLCaveing = server.Wearing.GetCLCaveing(wearID);

Step 1.8
Find “if (CLRunecrafting > getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]))” and under it add

if (CLCaveing > getLevelForXP(playerXP[21])) { sM("You are not a high enough level to use this item."); sM("You need to have a "+statName[playerCaveing]+" level of "+CLCaveing+"."); GoFalse = true; }

Step 2:
(still in client.java)
Add this void under “public class client extends Player implements Runnable {”

public void cave() { sendQuest("Caveing Information", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("To start caveing type @red@::cstart", 8147); sendQuest("Caveing is 4 stages featureing different monsters.", 8149); sendQuest("Each stage will require you to kill a certain amount of a monster.", 8150); sendQuest("Once you kill the right amount of that monster,", 8151); sendQuest("You'll automatically be moved to the next stage.", 8152); sendQuest("If you leave a stage you will have to restart.", 8153); sendQuest("Caveing Runs Completed: @red@"+ cwin +"", 8155); sendQuest("Caveing Coded Entirely by [Eminemsgod, Cowarooroo]", 8156); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

[size=12pt]Step 3:[/size]
Find “public boolean isIn” and find where it says isin(something) and shows some coords under it.
Under that add…

[code] public boolean isInCaveing1()
{
return absX >= 2695 && absX <= 2748 && absY >= 9413 && absY <=9469;
}

public boolean isInCaveing2()
{
    return absX >= 2695 && absX <= 2750 && absY >= 9472 && absY <=9510;
}

public boolean isInCaveing3()
{
    return absX >= 2687 && absX <= 2732 && absY >= 9497 && absY <=9529;
}

public boolean isInCaveing4()
{
    return absX >= 2647 && absX <= 2689 && absY >= 9538 && absY <=9577;
}[/code]

This code simply states where the Skills areas are.

[size=12pt]Step 4:[/size]
Find

} else if (token.equals("character-rights")) { playerRights = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and under it add

} else if (token.equals("character-caveingstage")) { caveingstage = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-kills1")) { kills1 = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-kills2")) { kills2 = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-kills3")) { kills3 = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-kills4")) { kills4 = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-boss1")) { boss1 = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-boss2")) { boss2 = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-boss3")) { boss3 = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-cwin")) { cwin = Integer.parseInt(token2);

[size=12pt]Step 5:[/size]
Find

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-rights = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(playerRights), 0, Integer .toString(playerRights).length());

and under it add

characterfile.write("character-caveingstage = ", 0, 25); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(caveingstage), 0, Integer.toString(caveingstage).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-kills1 = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(kills1), 0, Integer.toString(kills1).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-kills2 = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(kills2), 0, Integer.toString(kills2).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-kills3 = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(kills3), 0, Integer.toString(kills3).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-kills4 = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(kills4), 0, Integer.toString(kills4).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-boss1 = ", 0, 18); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(boss1), 0, Integer.toString(boss1).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-boss2 = ", 0, 18); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(boss2), 0, Integer.toString(boss2).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-boss3 = ", 0, 18); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(boss3), 0, Integer.toString(boss3).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-cwin = ", 0, 17); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(cwin), 0, Integer.toString(cwin).length()); characterfile.newLine();

[size=12pt]Step 6:[/size]
Find “makeglobalobject” and add this to the list of objects.

/*Caveing*/ makeGlobalObject(2705, 9464, 33, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2707, 9470, 37, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2708, 9470, 37, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2709, 9470, 59, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2710, 9470, 37, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2711, 9470, 37, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2678, 9566, 2213, 1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2679, 9567, 2213, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2681, 9567, 409, 2, 10); /*End of Caveing*/

[size=12pt]Step 7:[/size]
Lastly add into your commands

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("caveing")) { cave(); }

[size=12pt]Step 8:[/size]
Npchandler.java
Find “public void process() {” and under it add

if ((npcs[i].npcType == 55) && (temp.caveingstage == 1) && (temp.isInCaveing1())) { temp.kills1 += 1; temp.sM("You've killed "+ temp.kills1 +" out of 10 Blue Dragons!"); } if ((npcs[i].npcType == 54) && (temp.caveingstage == 2) && (temp.isInCaveing2())) { temp.kills2 += 1; temp.sM("You've killed "+ temp.kills2 +" out of 5 Black Dragons!"); } if ((npcs[i].npcType == 50) && (temp.caveingstage == 3) && (temp.isInCaveing3())) { temp.kills3 += 1; temp.sM("You've killed "+ temp.kills3 +" out of 2 KBD's!"); } if (temp.caveingstage == 4 && temp.isInCaveing4()) { if (npcs[i].npcType == 1115 && temp.boss1 == 0) { temp.boss1 += 1; temp.kills4 += 1; temp.sM("You've killed "+ temp.kills4 +" out of 3 Bosses's!"); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1115 && temp.boss1 == 1) { temp.sM("You've already killed this boss!"); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2686 && temp.boss2 == 0) { temp.boss2 += 1; temp.kills4 += 1; temp.sM("You've killed "+ temp.kills4 +" out of 3 Bosses's!"); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2686 && temp.boss2 == 1) { temp.sM("You've already killed this boss!"); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2679 && temp.boss3 == 0) { temp.boss3 += 1; temp.kills4 += 1; temp.sM("You've killed "+ temp.kills4 +" out of 3 Bosses's!"); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2679 && temp.boss3 == 1) { temp.sM("You've already killed this boss!"); } }

([size=10pt]NOTE:[/size] temp. is how my Npchandler recognizes stuff like playerRights and other ints like that. Yours might be different so search around your Npchandler.java for playerRights and see what is in front of all of those and replace temp. with that!)

[size=12pt]b[/b][/size]

if ((npcs[i].npcType == 55) && (temp.caveingstage == 1) && (temp.isInCaveing1())) { temp.kills1 += 1; temp.sM("You've killed "+ temp.kills1 +" out of 10 Blue Dragons!"); }
////
This simply makes sure you’re in the right area and adds the kill to your player file so that the server knows how many more you need to continue.

[size=12pt]Step 9:[/size]
Autospawn.cfg

pawn = 0 3210 3427 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 2686 2652 9564 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 1115 2659 9548 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 2679 2674 9544 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 494 2682 9563 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 50 2719 9520 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 54 2732 9486 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 54 2740 9492 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 55 2727 9431 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 55 2727 9439 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 55 2727 9447 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 55 2727 9455 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 55 2731 9431 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 55 2731 9439 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 55 2731 9447 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 55 2731 9455 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 55 2735 9431 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 55 2735 9439 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 55 2735 9447 0 0 0 0 0 0 spawn = 55 2735 9455 0 0 0 0 0 0

[size=12pt]Step 10:[/size]
Player.java
Find “public int qp” and under it add

public int caveingstage; public int kills1; public int kills2; public int kills3; public int kills4; public int boss1; public int boss2; public int boss3; public int cwin;

-[size=12pt]THINGS I LEFT OUT OF THE TUTORIAL THAT YOU NEED TO DO BELOW[/size]-
In Player.java search for “public int playerRunecrafting = 20;” and under it add

	public int playerCaveing = 21;

Also in Wearing.java find “public int GetCLRunecrafting(int ItemID) {” and under

if (ItemName.startsWith("Runecrafting hood")) { return 99; } return 1; }
add

public int GetCLCaveing(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Caveing cape")) { return 99; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Caveing hood")) { return 99; } return 1; }

And your done!!!

Read full topic
